register-w-bfs: Sign Up with Blessed for Service
by-agree: By Signing up with us you agree to these privacy terms.
username-url-safe: The Username cannot contain any of these characters [!@#$%^&*(),.?":{}|<>]
username-space-safe: The Username cannot contain any spaces.
email-taken: The email address is already taken.
email-free: The email address is not taken.
user-length: The username is too long it exceeds 17 characters.
regions-warn: Please select your Continent, Country and State (unless your State is not listed).
thank-you: Thank you for signing up to be a part of the Great Awakening with the Blessed for Service team.
pass-length: The password must contain at least 8 characters.
pass-az-low: The password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
pass-az-up: The password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
pass-number: The password must contain at least one number.
pass-special: The password must contain at least one special character. Example [!@#$%^&*]
newsletter-warn: After signing up to the Blessed for Service website, you will automatically receive our newsletter and updates. You can unsubscribe from our mailing list at any time using the unsubscribe link contained in every email.
